verses.text:
Then \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* and \w Aholiab|strong="H0171"\w*, and every \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, in \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* how to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* all manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, according to all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Bezaleel|strong="H1212"\w* and \w Aholiab|strong="H0171"\w*, and every \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, in whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \add even\add* every one whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* stirred him \w up|strong="H5375"\w* to \w come|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* it:

And they \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* all the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w*, which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* for the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it \add withal\add*. And they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* yet unto him free \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

And all the wise \w men|strong="H2450"\w*, that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w work|strong="H4399"\w* which they \w made|strong="H6213"\w*;

¶ And they \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* much \w more|strong="H7235"\w* than \w enough|strong="H1767"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w make|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* gave \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w*, and they caused it to be \w proclaimed|strong="H6963"\w* throughout the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let neither \w man|strong="H0376"\w* nor \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* any more \w work|strong="H4399"\w* for the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*. So the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w restrained|strong="H3607"\w* from \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w*.
For the \w stuff|strong="H4399"\w* they had was \w sufficient|strong="H1767"\w* for all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it, and too \w much|strong="H3498"\w*.

¶ And every \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* hearted \w man|strong="H3820"\w* among them that \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*: \add with\add* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* of \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he them.

The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add were\add* all of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w size|strong="H4060"\w*.

And he \w coupled|strong="H2266"\w* the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* unto \w another|strong="H0259"\w*: and \add the other\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* he \w coupled|strong="H2266"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* unto \w another|strong="H0259"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* on the \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* from the \w selvedge|strong="H7098"\w* in the \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w*: likewise he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w uttermost|strong="H7020"\w* \w side|strong="H8193"\w* of \add another\add* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w*, in the \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*.\f + \fr 36.11 \ft selvedge: an edge of cloth so woven that it cannot unravel\f*

\w Fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he in \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w*, and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he in the \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* which \add was\add* in the \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*: the \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* \w held|strong="H6901"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add curtain\add* to \w another|strong="H0259"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w taches|strong="H7165"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w coupled|strong="H2266"\w* the \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* unto \w another|strong="H0259"\w* with the \w taches|strong="H7165"\w*: so it became \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add of\add* \w goats’|strong="H5795"\w* \add hair\add* for the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* over the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*: \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* them.

The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* \add was\add* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add was\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w*: the \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* \add were\add* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w size|strong="H4060"\w*.
And he \w coupled|strong="H2266"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* by themselves, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w* by themselves.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* upon the \w uttermost|strong="H7020"\w* \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* in the \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w*, and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w loops|strong="H3924"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he upon the \w edge|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w curtain|strong="H3407"\w* which \w coupleth|strong="H2279"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w taches|strong="H7165"\w* \add of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* to \w couple|strong="H2266"\w* the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \w together|strong="H2266"\w*, that it might be \w one|strong="H0259"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* for the \w tent|strong="H0168"\w* \add of\add* \w rams’|strong="H0352"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* dyed \w red|strong="H0119"\w*, and a \w covering|strong="H4372"\w* \add of\add* \w badgers’|strong="H8476"\w* \w skins|strong="H5785"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \add that\add*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, standing \w up|strong="H5975"\w*.

The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of a \w board|strong="H7175"\w* \add was\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of a \w board|strong="H7175"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and a \w half|strong="H2677"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w*, equally \w distant|strong="H7947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w another|strong="H0259"\w*: thus did he \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for all the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*; \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* for the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w side|strong="H6285"\w* \w southward|strong="H8486"\w*:

And \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* under the \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w* for his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w* for his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tenons|strong="H3027"\w*.

And for the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \add which is\add* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w corner|strong="H6285"\w*, he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*,

And their \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* under \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w*.
And for the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w* he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*.

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he for the \w corners|strong="H4742"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* in the two \w sides|strong="H3411"\w*.

And they were \w coupled|strong="H8382"\w* \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*, and \w coupled|strong="H8382"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* at the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* thereof, to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ring|strong="H2885"\w*: thus he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them in \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w corners|strong="H4740"\w*.\f + \fr 36.29 \ft coupled: Heb. twinned\f*

And there were \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w boards|strong="H7175"\w*; and their \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add were\add* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, under \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w board|strong="H7175"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w*.\f + \fr 36.30 \ft under…: Heb. two sockets, two sockets under one board\f*

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* of \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*; \w five|strong="H2568"\w* for the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*,

And \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* for the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w side|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* for the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* for the \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w middle|strong="H8484"\w* \w bar|strong="H1280"\w* to \w shoot|strong="H1272"\w* \w through|strong="H8432"\w* the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* from the one \w end|strong="H7097"\w* to the \w other|strong="H7097"\w*.

And he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* the \w boards|strong="H7175"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* their \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \add to be\add* \w places|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w vail|strong="H6532"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*: \add with\add* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he it of \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.

And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thereunto \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \add of\add* \w shittim|strong="H7848"\w* \add wood\add*, and \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* them with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: their \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w* \add were of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*; and he \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* for them \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

¶ And he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* an \w hanging|strong="H4539"\w* for the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, of \w needlework|strong="H7551"\w*;\f + \fr 36.37 \ft of needlework: Heb. the work of a needleworker or, embroiderer\f*

And the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* of it with their \w hooks|strong="H2053"\w*: and he \w overlaid|strong="H6823"\w* their \w chapiters|strong="H7218"\w* and their \w fillets|strong="H2838"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: but their \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w sockets|strong="H0134"\w* \add were of\add* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.
